rows: 60-foot line of acid (6d4 points of acid damage; Reflex half)
60-foot line of electricity (6d8 points of electricity damage; Reflex half)

30-foot cone of repulsion gas (move away for 1d6 rounds; Will negates)
30-foot cone of slow gas (slowed, as the spell, for 1d6 rounds; Will negates)
30-foot cone of weaknening gas (1d2 temporary Str damage; Fortitude negates)
30-foot cone of corrosive gas (6d6 points of acid damage; Reflex half)
